ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Help
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yeah, right.... Each CD Key *is* different, and can only be used once. If you want a new account you need a new CD Key, as your original one is still tied
ygData.messageBody:
badbrad112@... wrote:
> Hi everyone.. i have tried to creat a new account after a long time
> off of everquest but i can't find my original cd case! I can't find
> what the account number is (cd number) for the original everquest if
> anyone could please post what the cd key is i would be very
> thankful. You are in no danger, i phoned a everquest help line and
> they said that all the CD codes are the same so its not like i can
> steal your accounts or anything... any help would be great

Yeah, right....

Each CD Key *is* different, and can only be used once.

If you want a new account you need a new CD Key, as your original one is
still tied to your original account (and ours are all used to make our
accounts and can't be reused anyway). If you can remember your username
and password you can just reactivate your old account. It will still be
there as the don't delete inactive acounts.

Matt
